entry.title: Russia Extends Control Over Key Ukraine City as U.S. Plans to Boost Kyiv's Firepower
entry.content: Moscow has intensified its push to take Severodonetsk, as Western leaders take new measures to punish Russia and the Biden administration plans to provide Ukraine with precision-guided rocket systems.

entry.title: Expatriate Executives Flee Saudi Arabia's Bad Bosses
entry.content: The kingdom wants to attract the worldâ€™s best and brightest to futuristic projects such as Neom. But a difficult workplace culture is driving many away.
